name: Final-10
description:
made in 4 days for the #BulletHellJam.

You are the last stand defending the earth from an alien invasion,

every 10 second a procedurally generated boss will fight with you to dead.

you must defeat him before the counter reaches zero otherwise he will escape to attack a city on the planet.

Controls:

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK to shoot

have fun!
